gov.va.isaac.gui

Class IndexStatusListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.isaac.gui.IndexStatusListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.ihtsdo.otf.tcc.model.index.service.IndexStatusListenerBI

    @Service
 @Singleton
public class IndexStatusListener
extends Object
implements org.ihtsdo.otf.tcc.model.index.service.IndexStatusListenerBI
    IndexStatusListener A simple service that lets any ISAAC code tie in an action to index change events. Simply pass a consumer into one of the on* methods. Make sure you maintain a reference to the consumer - this class uses weak references, and will not hold them from the garbage collector.
    Author:
    Dan Armbrust
